author: Tim Hume, VICE News
title: Wuhan's Lockdown Is Over and People Are Getting the Hell Out
description: After 76 days in lockdown, Wuhan is celebrating, but the government is using surveillance technology to make sure some people don't move around the city.
content:
Chinese officials lifted the worlds first coronavirus lockdown Wednesday, sparking an exodus of tens of thousands of Wuhan residents who have been sealed off from the outside world for 76 days.
